title: Discover the Artefact's Secrets
content:
We communicated with the lich queen Vlaakith, who told us there is someone inside the artefact - and that we should kill them. We can combine the artefact with the planecaster to enter it. Objective 8: Find the being in the Astral Prism. We entered the Astral Prism. Now to find who's in here. Objective 9: Leave the Astral Prism. There is indeed a being inside the artefact. We spoke to them and decided not to kill them. We can leave the Astral Prism.

Dror Ragzlin, the goblin king, spoke of the
